verses.verse: Now it came to pass in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, that <S%H5576>Sennacherib<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> against all the <S%H1219>defenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H8610>took<s%> them.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%> from <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> with a <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H2426>army<s%>. And he <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H8585>conduit<s%> of the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H1295>pool<s%> in the <S%H4546>highway<s%> of the <S%H3526>fuller's<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>.

Then came <S%H3318>forth<s%> unto him <S%H471>Eliakim<s%>, <S%H2518>Hilkiah's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, which was over the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H7644>Shebna<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, and <S%H3098>Joah<s%>, <S%H623>Asaph's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, the <S%H2142>recorder<s%>. scribe: or, secretary

And <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H559>Say<s%> ye now to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, What <S%H986>confidence<s%> is this wherein thou <S%H982>trustest<s%>?

I <S%H559>say<s%>, sayest thou, (but they are but <S%H8193>vain<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>) I have <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H1369>strength<s%> for <S%H4421>war<s%>: now on whom dost thou <S%H982>trust<s%>, that thou <S%H4775>rebellest<s%> against me? vain: Heb. a word of lips I have: or, but counsel and strength are for the war

Lo, thou <S%H982>trustest<s%> in the <S%H4938>staff<s%> of this <S%H7533>broken<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>, on <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; whereon if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5564>lean<s%>, it will <S%H935>go<s%> into his <S%H3709>hand<s%>, and <S%H5344>pierce<s%> it: so is <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to all that <S%H982>trust<s%> in him.

But if thou <S%H559>say<s%> to me, We <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>: is it not he, whose high <S%H1116>places<s%> and whose <S%H4196>altars<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> hath taken <S%H5493>away<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, Ye shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> this <S%H4196>altar<s%>?

Now therefore give <S%H6148>pledges<s%>, I pray thee, to my <S%H113>master<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>, if thou be <S%H3201>able<s%> on thy part to <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H7392>riders<s%> upon them. pledges: or, hostages

How then wilt thou turn <S%H7725>away<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6346>captain<s%> of the <S%H6996>least<s%> of my <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and put thy <S%H982>trust<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and for <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>?

And am I now come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H1107>without<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> against this <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it? the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Go <S%H5927>up<s%> against this <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H471>Eliakim<s%> and <S%H7644>Shebna<s%> and <S%H3098>Joah<s%> unto <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%>, <S%H1696>Speak<s%>, I pray thee, unto thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> in the Syrian <S%H762>language<s%>; for we <S%H8085>understand<s%> it: and <S%H1696>speak<s%> not to us in the Jews' <S%H3066>language<s%>, in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are on the <S%H2346>wall<s%>.

But <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Hath my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to thy <S%H113>master<s%> and to thee to <S%H1696>speak<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%>? hath he not sent me to the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, that they may <S%H398>eat<s%> their own <S%H2716>dung<s%> <S%H6675><s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> their own <S%H4325>piss<s%> <S%H7272><s%> <S%H7890><s%> with you?

Then <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%>, and <S%H7121>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the Jews' <S%H3066>language<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Let not <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H5377>deceive<s%> you: for he shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you.

Neither let <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> make you <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5337>surely<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us: this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall not be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hearken<s%> not to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>: for thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, <S%H6213>Make<s%> an agreement with me by a <S%H1293>present<s%>, and come <S%H3318>out<s%> to me: and <S%H398>eat<s%> ye every <S%H376>one<s%> of his <S%H1612>vine<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> of his fig <S%H8384>tree<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> ye every <S%H376>one<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of his own <S%H953>cistern<s%>; Make: or, Seek my favour by a present: Heb. Make with me a blessing

Until I <S%H935>come<s%> and take you <S%H3947>away<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> like your own <S%H776>land<s%>, a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H8492>wine<s%>, a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>.

Beware lest <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H5496>persuade<s%> you, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us. Hath <S%H376>any<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>?

Where are the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> and <S%H774>Arphad<s%>? where are the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H5617>Sepharvaim<s%>? and have they <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>?

Who are they among all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of these <S%H776>lands<s%>, that have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> should <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>?

But they held their <S%H2790>peace<s%>, and <S%H6030>answered<s%> him not a <S%H1697>word<s%>: for the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> was, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H6030>Answer<s%> him not.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H471>Eliakim<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, that was over the <S%H1004>household<s%>, and <S%H7644>Shebna<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, and <S%H3098>Joah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, the <S%H2142>recorder<s%>, to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> with their <S%H899>clothes<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%>.
